gameDetails.name: Verflixxt hoch 2
gameDetails.description:
Verflixxt Hoch²! is the second expansion for Verflixxt! (That's Life!).

It contains:

     60 movement cards
     8 risk tiles
     8 goal chips
     1 green lucky hat
     1 red unlucky cap


All or some of these elements can be added to the base game, with or without the first expansion.

Expands:

    Verflixxt! (That's Life!).
